attributes.action: make changes to the employment benefits system. community service for benefits.  (see details)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who claim unemployment benefit and immigrants wanting citizenship etc should do a minimum of 20 hours per week community service.  

If we have a million people claiming unemployment benefit, how many are able bodied enough to do a full days work for there benefit? 

Lets get them out cleaning the streets, parks, start a community service group in all boroughs that has access to an unused workforce, where groups (i.e community halls) can request a workforce for free (as we are paying taxes that cover the benefits), to do service at that community hall.  

Lets get the people putting something in to their community to get something out (benefit).

If they refuse to do these "community jobs" then they should receive a lower ammount of benefits (as they are refusin work etc).

And the same for immigrants, work for citizenship, if they want to live here, let them contribute 1st too.  Im not asking for a slave labour force, but value for money, my money, your money, the countries money.

lets get a workforce for the community supplied by the community.
